EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-02-24 XtremIO & VMTurbo.EMAIL-Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending The XtremIO and VMTurbo, Assure the Performance of I/O Intensive Workloads At Scale Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending Containers, Microservices, and Latency, Oh My! Last Thursday. We hope you left with some useful takeaways.
Please feel free to watch the webinar on demand at your convenience! You can find the recording here <http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-thank-you-containers-microservices-why-they-matter/>. You can also find the slide deck for the presentation here <http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/ContainersMicroservicesAndLatency.pdf>.
If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or our Evaluation Team <mailto:evalteam@vmturbo.com>.
- The VMTurbo Team
